work.title: Full Stack Web Developer
work.desc: Building and maintaining websites (Technologies used - Laravel-PHP, HTML, CSS, JQuery, JS, REST APIs, MySQL, Shopify, Adobe Illustrator, Figma. Developing websites with CRUD functionality, notifying users via emails, fetching data from APIs, creating custom features. Used JIRA for collaboration among team members for better team work.
